dc_title_s: A general map of the middle British colonies in America : viz. Virginia, Maryland, Delaware, Pensilvania, New-Jersey, New-York, Connecticut and Rhode-Island : of Aquanishuonigy the country of the confederate Indians comprehending Aquanishuonigy proper, their places of residence, Ohio and Thuchsochruntie their deer hunting countries, Couchsachrage and Skaniadarade their beaver hunting countries, of the Lakes Erie, Ontario and Champlain, and of part of New-France : where is also shewn the antient and present seats of the Indian nations
dc_description_s: Eighteenth century map showing the mid atlantic British colonies. Scale approximately 1:2,250,000; 1 map: hand colored; 49 x 67 cm Northeastern States--Maps--Early works to 1800
